qas.question: What did Bell promise to split with his financers?
In what country other than the U.S. did Bell try to patent his telegraph?
Which country did Bell first try to get a patent?
Who did Bell ask to get a patent in Britain?
What kind of telegraph did Bell create?

context: In 1875, Bell developed an <a4_0>acoustic<a4_0/> telegraph and drew up a patent application for it. Since he had agreed to share <a0_0>U.S. profits<a0_0/> with his investors Gardiner Hubbard and Thomas Sanders, Bell requested that an associate in Ontario, <a3_0>George Brown<a3_0/>, attempt to patent it in <a1_0><a2_0>Britain<a2_0/><a1_0/>, instructing his lawyers to apply for a patent in the U.S. only after they received word from Britain (Britain would issue patents only for discoveries not previously patented elsewhere).
